participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, Jake loves pushing his limits and exploring the outdoors. He has a pragmatic approach to life and values hard work.
participant_1.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i hate the color pink. my father was a construction worker. i don't drink alcohol. i'm a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and optimistic, Sophia is excited about her growing family and is eager to embrace the challenges of motherhood.
participant_2.background: i just moved into my first home. i am expecting triplets in three months. a already have a step children. i recently moved to this country.
